about.title: About the project
about.text: A modern Kanban-style task management application built with Angular and Firebase. Join helps teams organize, assign, and track tasks in real-time using drag & drop functionality and responsive design.

process.title: How I have organised my work process
process.text: I structured the project into reusable Angular components and services. Clear file and folder naming conventions, TypeScript interfaces, and SCSS modules ensured scalability and maintainability. Firebase was used for backend services like authentication and real-time data handling.

team.title: My experience
team.text: I deepened my understanding of Angular 20 and TypeScript 5, especially reactive forms, routing, and animations. Working with Firebase taught me about authentication, Firestore database structure, and deploying modern web apps with real-time features.

about.title: About the project
about.text: El Pollo Loco is a browser-based platform game with HTML5, CSS3 and modern JavaScript (ES6+), without frameworks. Pepe the hero of the game moves through the level and collects coins and bottles. He has to avoid the crazy chickens and chicks by jumping. The collected bottles are thrown at the boss and hopefully killed.

process.title: Technical basics
process.text: Display of the game world and all objects (characters, background, enemies) was realized within the Canvas API. Using requestAnimationFrame or setInterval, for example, movements and collisions were realized. The game should also be playable on smaller screens.

about.title: About the project
about.text: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.

process.title: How I have organised my work process
process.text: How do you keep your code clean and maintainable? Have you broken the project down into reusable modules or components? Focus on documentation, naming files, variables, classes and testing.

about.title: About the project
about.text: I designed a relaunch of the website for the company CCN Umzüge based on WordPress. Here, too, the focus was on a contemporary design and a clear structure of the content. A calculator for the removal goods was also to be created. The images and video produced specifically for the website gave the site a very personal and individual touch.

process.title: How I organized my work process
process.text: How do I ensure that design and technology harmonize? I managed the project holistically – from the initial screen design to the technical implementation in WordPress. I divided the project management into clear phases: conception, design draft, and development. To ensure the site's maintainability, I focused on a clean structure for the WordPress installation, performed image optimizations for performance (important for the galleries' loading times), and set up an intuitive backend for the client.

about.title: About the project
about.text: The client requested a contemporary design for their website, avoiding excessive effects. Therefore, I worked with subtle transitions and established the logo as a stylistic element.

about.title: About the project
about.text: El Pollo Loc ist ein browserbasierten Jump’n’Run-Spiels mit HTML5, CSS3 und modernem JavaScript (ES6+), ohne Frameworks. Pepe der Held des Spieles Bewegt sich durch das Level und sammel Münzen und Flaschen ein. Es muss duch springen den verrückten Hühner und kücken ausweichen. Mit den eingesammelten flaschen wird er Endgegner beworfen und hoffentlich getötet.

process.title: How I organized my work process
process.text: Darstellung der Spielwelt und aller Objekte (Charaktere, Hintergrund, Gegner)wurde innerhalb der Canvas API realisiert. Per requestAnimationFrame oder setInterval wurden z.B. Bewegungen und Kollisionen realisiert. Das Spiel sollte auch auf kleiner bildschirmen Spielbar sein.
